content: pumpkin is an original crochet pattern by june gilbank crochet yourself a pumpkin - the perfect pattern for autumn with this one basic pattern you can create a realistic pumpkin for your fall table a cute amigurumi-style pumpkin for the kids or a spooooooooooooooky pumpkin for halloween **yarn ** worsted weight yarn in orange plus brown or green for the stalk **hook ** e us/3 5mm crochet hook **size ** approx 3 5 diameter your gauge and yarn choice will affect the finished size slightly note this pattern is donationware - the pattern is available for free but if you like it please consider sending me a donation to show your appreciation the pdf version available for any size donation is formatted for easy viewing and printing but the complete pattern is available to view in full for no charge from the linked page *** > ***please join us*** *in the planetjune crochet designs > group http //www ravelry com/groups/planetjune-crochet-designs > - you can get pattern support join crochet-alongs show off your fos > suggest new designs and chat all > welcome *
